fact: Abhishek Bansal is an aspiring full stack developer passionate about web development, debugging, and API development.
He is proficient in multiple programming languages including JavaScript, C++, Python, and SQL.
Abhishek has strong frontend skills in HTML/CSS, ReactJS, NextJS, and frameworks like Tailwind and Bootstrap.
On the backend, he is experienced with NodeJS, ExpressJS, and database management using MongoDB.
Tools and platforms he frequently uses include Git, Visual Studio/VS Code, Canva, and ChatGPT.
Currently interning at Explorin.io as a Web Development Intern, where he develops and maintains high-performance web applications using the MERN stack.
Abhishek is pursuing a Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science from Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam Technical University, with a CGPA of 7.3.
He completed his Senior Secondary Education at De Paul School, Bilari, Moradabad, with a percentage of 71.6%.
During his Secondary Education at De Paul School, Bilari, Moradabad, he secured a percentage of 76.4%.
He developed a comprehensive E-Commerce Website using ReactJS, Firebase/Firestore, Bootstrap, HTML, Tailwind CSS, and MongoDB, providing a solid online shopping experience.
Abhishek also built 'MyPortfolio,' a responsive web application using ReactJS, CSS, ThreeJS, and JavaScript, featuring interactive 3D visualizations.
He participated in the Internal Smart Indian Hackathon 2023, showcasing his problem-solving and coding skills.
Abhishek secured a Silver Medal in the AKTU Zonals Kho Kho Competition, demonstrating his athleticism and team spirit.
He was the winner of 'The Styling Geek,' a website design competition held by CSSS at MIT, highlighting his creativity and design skills.
As the Chief Editor of the College Newsletter, Abhishek oversaw the editorial process, curated content, and managed a team to ensure high-quality publications.
He served as the Student Coordinator of the Hobbies Club, organizing over 20 activities, leading to a 30% increase in student participation.
Abhishek designed eye-catching posters for over 12 events, which led to a 40% increase in attendance, showcasing his visual communication skills.
He is a self-taught developer, continuously learning new technologies and frameworks to stay updated with the latest trends in web development.
Abhishek is a quick learner, able to grasp new concepts and implement them effectively in projects, ensuring high-quality deliverables.
He is a team player, collaborating with cross-functional teams to achieve project milestones and deliver exceptional results.
Abhishek is a detail-oriented individual, focusing on the finer aspects of development to create seamless user experiences and interfaces.
He has excellent problem-solving skills, capable of troubleshooting issues and optimizing code to enhance application performance.
